frontmatter.title: Coaching: Anchors Only Bring Safety in a Storm
frontmatter.description: Clinging onto anchors(such as jobs, relationships or commitments that don't serve our deeper desires) can prevent one from moving forward. Security necessary in a turmoil can become a hinderance when freedom calls.
keywords: breaking free from the comfort zone
